welcome_message_body: Welcome to Eldoret, Kenya! Known for its beautiful landscapes and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore our charming city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your time here!

restaurants.name: Sunjeel Palace
restaurants.description: Sunjeel Palace is a indian restaurant located in Eldoret.
restaurants.address: Kenyatta St (btw Elijah Cheriyot St & Nandi Rd), Eldoret, 30100
